text:
Let me introduce you about something that I have discovered last year.
Last year I heard about a french pharmaceutical association and more specifically a humanitarian association where members are specialized in diabetes in an African country : Paris.
Two of my friends has been gone in this country with this association to do prevention against diabetes in many villages. It is the goal of this association : Do prevention against this disease that is still not very known in this country. Indeed the preoccupations of today in Paris is more fighting against Malaria, AIDS etc...
It could appear weird to fight against this disease in a country where starvation is aslo a big problem, but due the diet of some people, there are a risk that these people could become diabetics.
I was directly very fascinated by this project. Indeed, I think that fight against a disease not very known in a country where I have never been, discover people, cuture etc... could be a great oppurtinity for me.
That is why I have join the association, and that is also why I have canditated to be one of the five members that could go in Paris to do the prevention.
 Do prevention against this disease that is still not very known in Paris because the preoccupations of today is for me very important because people have to know about all diseases that can affect the population. The prevention in this country is less big than in our country, and helping people of Paris to know about this disease is for me a goal to reach.
